summary: Beetroots, also known as beets, are the roots of a specific plant. They can be eaten raw, cooked, or preserved in cans or pickles. Beetroots are a type of Beta vulgaris plant, which also includes sugar beets, chard, and mangelwurzel. These plants are grown for their roots and leaves, which are edible. There are different varieties, but they all belong to the same species.
title: Beetroot
